Source.Name: kdebase
Source.Description: kdebase contains core runtime files for the K Desktop Environment 3.

Update.Comment: Add a hack to fix hangs when restarting kicker while a GTK application is embedded in system tray
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: - Really remove konqy icon from KDM, - Fix df usage in startkde for available space computation, - Override the default.png which was breaking the panel (#16300), - Don't enable the tile background in kicker by default,
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Cleanup ksmserver's shutdown dialog, - Improve low disk space handling, - Clean startkde script. - Warn user about low disk space and prevent login (#15274).
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fetch default keyboard layout from X server
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: - Add Suse patch to fix nsplugin crash issues, - Add transition patch for Plymouth,
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Drop faulty and hackish kmix startup logic.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Add patch to fix kdm privilege escalation vulnerability. (CVE-2010-0436, #12677)
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Update.Comment: - Add time.ume.tubitak.gov.tr and time.deu.edu.tr to time server list, - Disable polkit patch, switch to kdesu.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: ksplash/moodin: Keep XDM background if available
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: - Fix automake and Python detection, - Hide GRUB' otheroptions from reboot menu.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Unify home folder icons over all the desktop (#4494).
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix fixed_mount permission stuff by calling kdesu
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Switch to timezone backend instead of util_linux one
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Refactor and improve all the COMAR/Clock logic, thanks to Fatih.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Make jimmac the default icon theme, - Decrease krunner bounce timeout from 30 to 5 seconds.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Create Xsession symlink and change some kdm defaults: - Enable TerminateServer - Set default paths for Xreset, Xstartup and Xsetup
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Add latest branch fixes (Ozan) Adopt kdmrc defaults to work with new xinit/xdm packages. Add xinit dep. (Fatih) Fix qt dependencies (Ekin)
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Fix suspend-to-ram icon in kickoff menu (#7306).
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Don't translate 'Public Time Server' to Turkish in kcmclockrc (#9129), - Enhance directory renaming attitude patch (#6280).
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Add low disk space warning (#4954, #8246), - Spawn pulseaudio using full path.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix COMAR service script which wasn't setting the kdmrc 'Language=' correctly.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Turkish monetary symbol has switched back to TL from 01 January 2009.
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: - Fix kicker's clockapplet which was calling kdesu regardless of the exec's value in clock.desktop. Hopefully kdesu won't show up when trying to set the time, - Add missing translations of Programs' directory in KMenu (Fixes #5912, #7701), - Fix directory renaming attitude of konqueror (Fixes #6280), - Add desktop files from kdeedu for Edutainment translations (Fixes #3665), - Add translation support for HAL device names into kio_media HAL backend (Fixes #8060).
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Sync with SVN branch to include some fixes
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Remove buggy extract-here.desktop as the same functionality is provided by kdeaddons
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Increase timeout of Xorg.Display's ready method call
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add kwinrc for default kwin style to fix problems in kwindecoration module
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Fix mount problems related to a redundant patch introduced by 3.5.10
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Fix wallpapers when the number of screens changes
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Add beagle as missing runtime dep of kdebase-beagle. We removed kerry to break a circular, but beagle dependency is forgotten
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Synchronize system language with KDM's and sync non-kde app language with KDE's (bug #7241)
Update.Name: Pınar Yanardağ

Update.Comment: Use COMAR to set date and timezone.
Update.Name: Bahadır Kandemir

Update.Comment: Do not fail if .Xmodmap does not exist
Update.Name: Fatih Aşıcı

Update.Comment: Add missing build dep, remove temporary pulseaudio files before logon
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Fix ucred redefinition problem introduced with glibc2.80
Update.Name: Ekin Meroğlu

Update.Comment: Service script fixed, zorg and acpid runtime deps. added
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix for compilation error "lqt-mt not found"
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: kerry is removed from runtime deps. to break a circular dep
Update.Name: Gökçen Eraslan

Update.Comment: Fix password masking problem in KDM
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Make KDM aware of non ascii passwords
Update.Name: Ozan Çağlayan

Update.Comment: Put package-manager below Tasma in main menu
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Grab networkstatus branch patch set from KDE SVN
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add ConsoleKit support, patch grabbed by Fedora
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add new kicker startup animation, idea and artwork by Taylan Karaoğlu
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Fix keyboard events handling. (workaround for flash-player issue)
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Let user run scripts from local kioslaves
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Enable LegacyKMenu again with our menu structure
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Remove mount_removable patch which is replaced by update-fstab, enable KickOff as a default
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: hide dpms module if kpowersave is messing with DPMS, patch by OpenSuse
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: ntp-client added as a dep. KDE uses this to sync with time servers
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Get rid of /etc/skel, artwork is now seperated package, start kmix is /dev/dsp exists
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Restore ()'s around comments in kicker, remove logout applet diff
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Use locale=GLIBC_LOCALE to mount ntfs-3g volumes
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Branch update to fix media:/ kioslave
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Branch update to fix injection problems in khelpcenter
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Fix #3991 (kcontrol removed, digikam replaced by gimp cause its not in default install), oscar goes to Fatih Aşıcı
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: KickOff menu now in package with optional kdebase-beagle plugin, timeout dialog layout corrected, Safely remove now just unmounts
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: KDE now uses liblazy and hal to suspend, user can suspend from KDM also. Systray ordering is now supported, konqi has offline mode, logout/shutdown dialogs replaced with modern ones that provides timeouts
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Do not save compiz as a WM
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Start DBUS-Session with KDM and use PolicyKit
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Fixes KDED crashing on startup when D-BUS is unavailable, (KDE SVN #566466)
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Update media patch to fix KDE bugs #127971, #129534
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: remove tulliana dependency, tulliana2 used in kdelibs.
Update.Name: Barış Metin

Update.Comment: Enable new media slave, remove useless ejectPatch
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Make align to grid work on desktop
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Use grubonce to select next reboot
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Check return values of setuid calls and fix CVE-2006-2449
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Enable GRUB support so users can select which OS/Kernel will booted on next reboot
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Support X-KDE-Protocols in konqueror RMB menu
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: use XAUTHLOCALHOSTNAME as host name (with kdelibs and xorg patches)
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Use zeroconf for ksysguard and etc.
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add speedup, powersave support and smb fix patches
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add Eject Button Pressed signal support (fix #2166)
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Tidy up kicker patches with some improvements on defaults (no button tile, Pardus font and so). Fix #1718. Apply kwin OSD patch.
Update.Name: Barış Metin

Update.Comment: Show mounted devices on desktop by default and fix KDE bug #117031
Update.Name: İsmail Dönmez

Update.Comment: Moodin in included into kdebase as a patch(fix #877)
Update.Name: S.Çağlar Onur

Update.Comment: Add shutdown button support to KDM themes (bug #744)
Update.Name: Barış Metin
